::KitKat::

She sat back in the chair and sighed.  She still had her ribs causing 
her pain. She leaned back and thought about what the future would 
hold.  Despite her pred programming, she just didn't have the 
ambition that most other preds had.  She focused more on the concerns 
of her team.  She wanted to try to make they were taken care of.  She 
then realized that she would never make a good pred leader. She 
lowered her head and sighed.  She could never rule with the hand of 
terror like Megatron did. Or sacrifice her team mates to save 
herself. She took a deep sigh and wondered how she ever made it this 
far as a leader.  She then thought of getting even with Megatron. 
That thought brought a smile to her face.  She would like getting 
revenge on him very much.  She then thought that if they killed 
Megatron, that would bolster the confidence in her team and then they 
could attack and get those maximals that put them in this situation 
in the first place.  She realized that revenge was a good motivator 
for herself and would just as good for her team mates.  She smiled 
and rested her head on her hand and slowly drifted off into sleep.
